original_text: But if that servant says to himself, ‘My master is delayed in coming,’ and begins to beat the male and female servants, and to eat and drink and get drunk,
korean_text: 만일 그 종이 마음에 생각하기를 주인이 더디 오리라 하여 남녀 종들을 때리며 먹고 마시고 취하게 되면

sentences.original_text: But if that servant says to himself,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 만약 그 종이 마음속으로 말하기를,

sentences.original_text: and begins to beat the male and female servants,
and to eat and drink and get drunk,
